permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and modify the site's Wix Stores products and inventory.

params.name: id
params.doc: Product ID.

docs.summary: Adds media items to a specified product, either via URL or existing media ID.

permissions.name: Manage Products
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and modify the site's Wix Stores products and inventory.

params.name: id
params.doc: Product ID.

docs.summary:
Links media items that are already associated with a specific product to a choice within the same product.

 Media items can only be set for choices within one option at a time - e.g., if you set media items for some or all of the choices within the Colors option (blue, green, and red), you won't be able to also assign media items to choices within the Size option (S, M, and L).

 To remove all existing media items, call the [Remove Product Media From Choices](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-stores/catalog/products/remove-product-media-from-choices) endpoint.

docs.summary:
Adjusts a specified numerical property for up to 100 products at a time.
 The property can be increased or decreased either by percentage or amount.

Adjust the price of 2 products by percentage

extra.description: 1 product was found and successfully updated, while the other product was not found

params.name: id
params.doc: Requested product ID.

params.name: choices
params.doc:
Set of key-value pairs. The specific choices available or chosen from within a selection (e.g., choosing the red Selection triggers the red Choice).
 You may specify all the relevant choices for a specific variant, or only some of the options, which will return all corresponding variants (not relevant when passing variant IDs).

params.name: variantIds
params.doc: List of variant IDs (not relevant when passing choices).

params.name: includeMerchantSpecificData
params.doc: Whether merchant specific data should be included in the response. Requires permissions to manage products.

docs.summary:
Retrieves product variants, based on either choices (option-choice key-value pairs) or variant IDs.
 See [Stores Pagination](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-stores/pagination) for more information.

params.doc: Product ID.

params.name: media
params.doc: Optional - if an empty array is passed, all media will be removed from all choices.

docs.summary:
Removes media items from all or some of a product's choices.
 (Media items can only be set for choices within one option at a time - e.g., if you set media items for some or all of the choices within the Colors option (blue, green, and red), you won't be able to also assign media items to choices within the Size option (S, M, and L).)

members.name: kind
members.doc: The kind of value.

members.name: nullValue
members.doc: Represents a null value.

members.name: numberValue
members.doc: Represents a double value.

members.name: stringValue
members.doc: Represents a string value.

members.name: boolValue
members.doc: Represents a boolean value.

members.name: structValue
members.doc: Represents a structured value.

members.name: listValue
members.doc: Represents a repeated `Value`.

members.name: totalSuccesses
members.doc: Number of items that were successfully processed.

members.name: totalFailures
members.doc: Number of items that couldn't be processed.

members.name: undetailedFailures
members.doc: Number of failures without details because detailed failure threshold was exceeded.

members.name: id
members.doc: Item ID. Should always be available, unless it's impossible (for example, when failing to create an item).

members.name: originalIndex
members.doc: Index of the item within the request array. Allows for correlation between request and response items.

members.name: success
members.doc: Whether the requested action was successful for this item. When `false`, the `error` field is populated.

members.name: error
members.doc: Details about the error in case of failure.

members.name: itemMetadata
members.doc: Item metadata.

members.name: mainMedia
members.doc: Primary media (image, video etc) associated with this product.

members.name: items
members.doc: Media (images, videos etc) associated with this product.

members.name: thumbnail
members.doc: Media item thumbnail details.

members.name: mediaType
members.doc: Media item type (image, video, etc.).

members.name: title
members.doc: Media item title.

members.name: id
members.doc: Media ID (for example, `"nsplsh_306d666a123a4a74306459~mv2_d_4517_2992_s_4_2.jpg"`).

members.name: image
members.doc: Image data (URL, size).

members.name: video
members.doc: Video data (URL, size).

messages.name: _wix_catalog_api_v1_MediaItemUrlAndSize
messages.displayName: Media Item Url And Size Object

members.name: url
members.doc: Media item URL.

members.name: width
members.doc: Media item width.

members.name: height
members.doc: Media item height.

members.name: format
members.doc: Media format (mp4, png, etc.).

members.name: altText
members.doc: Alt text. This text will be shown in case the image is not available.

members.name: files
members.doc: Data (URL, size) about each resolution for which this video is available.

members.name: stillFrameMediaId
members.doc: ID of an image taken from the video. Used primarily for Wix Search indexing. For example, `"nsplsh_306d666a123a4a74306459~mv2_d_4517_2992_s_4_2.jpg"`.

members.name: choice
members.doc:
Optional - assign this media item to a specific product choice.
 Note that you may set media items for choices under only one option (e.g., if Colors blue, green, and red have media items, Sizes S, M, and L can't have media items assigned to them).
 You may clear existing media from choices via the Remove Product Media From Choices endpoint

members.name: mediaId
members.doc: Media ID. For media items previously saved in Wix Media, the media ID is returned in the Query Product response.

members.name: url
members.doc: Media external URL (for new media items).

members.name: option
members.doc: Product option. For example, color or size.

members.name: choice
members.doc: Choice within the option. For example, red or L.

members.name: mediaIds
members.doc: Media IDs (available via the Query Product endpoint).

members.name: optionType
members.doc: Option type - color or other(drop down)

members.name: name
members.doc: Option name (e.g., color, size)

members.name: choices
members.doc: Choices available for this option

members.name: value
members.doc: Color hex value or choice name

members.name: description
members.doc: Choice name

members.name: media
members.doc: Media items (images, videos) associated with this choice

members.name: inStock
members.doc: Based on the customer’s choices, which (if any) variants that include the selected choices are in stock

members.name: visible
members.doc: Based on the customer’s choices, which (if any) variants that include the selected choices are visible

members.name: currency
members.doc: Product price currency

members.name: price
members.doc: Product price

members.name: discountedPrice
members.doc: Discounted product price (if no discounted price is set, the product price is returned)

members.name: formatted
members.doc: The product price and discounted price, formatted with the currency

members.name: pricePerUnit
members.doc: Price per unit

members.name: price
members.doc: Product price formatted with the currency

members.name: discountedPrice
members.doc: Discounted product price formatted with the currency (if no discounted price is set, the product formatted price is returned)

members.name: pricePerUnit
members.doc: Price per unit

members.name: type
members.doc: Discount type: amount / percent

members.name: value
members.doc: Discount value

members.name: itemCost
members.doc: Item cost.

members.name: formattedItemCost
members.doc: Item cost formatted with currency symbol.

members.name: profit
members.doc: Profit. Calculated by reducing `cost` from `discounted_price`.

members.name: formattedProfit
members.doc: Profit formatted with currency symbol.

members.name: profitMargin
members.doc:
Profit Margin. Calculated by dividing `profit` by `discounted_price`.
 The result is rounded to 4 decimal places.

members.name: base
members.doc: Base URL. For premium sites, this is the domain. For free sites, this is the site URL (e.g mysite.wixsite.com/mysite).

members.name: path
members.doc: Path to the product page - e.g /product-page/a-product.

members.name: id
members.doc: WixMedia image ID.

members.name: url
members.doc: Image URL.

members.name: height
members.doc: Original image height.

members.name: width
members.doc: Original image width.

members.name: altText
members.doc: Image alt text. Optional.

members.name: filename
members.doc: Image filename. Optional.

members.name: id
members.doc: WixMedia ID.

members.name: resolutions
members.doc: Available resolutions for the video, starting with the optimal resolution.

members.name: filename
members.doc: Video filename. Optional.

members.name: url
members.doc: Video URL.

members.name: height
members.doc: Video height.

members.name: width
members.doc: Video width.

members.name: format
members.doc: Video format for example, mp4, hls.

members.name: price
members.doc: Variant price.

members.name: convertedPriceData
members.doc: Variant price data converted to currency provided in header.

members.name: weight
members.doc: Variant weight.

members.name: sku
members.doc: Variant SKU (stock keeping unit).

members.name: quantity
members.doc: Quantity currently in inventory (relevant only when tracking by inventory).

members.name: inStock
members.doc: Whether the product is currently in stock (relevant only when tracking manually).

members.name: visible
members.doc: Whether the variant is visible to customers.

messages.name: _wix_catalog_api_v1_VariantDataWithNoStock
messages.displayName: Variant Data With No Stock Object

members.name: priceData
members.doc: Variant price.

members.name: convertedPriceData
members.doc: Variant price data, converted to currency requested in header.

members.name: costAndProfitData
members.doc: Cost and profit data.

members.name: weight
members.doc: Variant weight.

members.name: sku
members.doc: Variant SKU (stock keeping unit).

members.name: visible
members.doc: Whether the variant is visible to customers.

docs.summary: Set of key-value pairs. Specific choices within a selection, as option-choice key-value pairs

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type string

members.name: id
members.doc: Requested Variant ID

members.name: choices
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs. Specific choices within a selection, as option-choice key-value pairs

members.name: stock
members.doc: Variant inventory status.

docs.summary: Set of key-value pairs. The specific choices available or chosen from within a selection (e.g., choosing the red Selection triggers the red Choice). You may specify all the relevant choices for a specific variant, or only some of the options, which will return all corresponding variants (Not relevant when passing variant IDs)

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type string

members.name: choices
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs. The specific choices available or chosen from within a selection (e.g., choosing the red Selection triggers the red Choice). You may specify all the relevant choices for a specific variant, or only some of the options, which will return all corresponding variants (Not relevant when passing variant IDs)

members.name: variantIds
members.doc:
List of variant IDs
 (Not relevant when passing choices)

members.name: price
members.doc: Variant price

members.name: cost
members.doc: Variant cost of goods

members.name: weight
members.doc: Variant weight

members.name: sku
members.doc: Variant SKU (stock keeping unit)

members.name: visible
members.doc: Whether the variant is visible to  customers

docs.summary: Set of key-value pairs. The selected options of this variant. For example, `{"Color": "Blue", "Size": "Large"}`.

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type string

members.name: id
members.doc: Store variant ID. Comprised of the `productId` and the `variantId`, separated by a hyphen: {productId}.{variantId}.

members.name: variantId
members.doc: Variant ID.

members.name: productId
members.doc: Product ID.

members.name: variantName
members.doc: Variant name.

members.name: productName
members.doc: Product name.

members.name: managedVariant
members.doc: Whether the variant is managed or represents a product.

members.name: sku
members.doc: Variant SKU (stock keeping unit).

members.name: stock
members.doc: Variant inventory status.

members.name: choices
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs. The selected options of this variant. For example, `{"Color": "Blue", "Size": "Large"}`.

members.name: collectionIds
members.doc: Collections that include this variant.

members.name: media
members.doc: Media items (images, videos) associated with this variant.

members.name: trackQuantity
members.doc: Whether inventory is being tracked.

members.name: quantity
members.doc: Quantity currently left in inventory.

members.name: inStock
members.doc: Whether the product is currently in stock (relevant only when tracking manually).

members.name: type
members.doc: SEO tag type. Supported values: `title`, `meta`, `script`, `link`.

members.name: props
members.doc: SEO tag attributes/properties (name, content, rel, href).

members.name: meta
members.doc: Tag meta data, e.g. {height: 300, width: 240}.

members.name: children
members.doc: Tag inner content e.g. `<title> inner content </title>`.

members.name: custom
members.doc: Whether the tag is a custom tag.

members.name: disabled
members.doc: Whether the tag is disabled.

members.name: preventAutoRedirect
members.doc: disable auto creation of 301 redirects on slug changes (enabled by default).

docs.summary:
The SEO schema object contains data about different types of meta tags. It makes sure that the information about your page is presented properly to search engines.
 The search engines use this information for ranking purposes, or to display snippets in the search results.
 This data will override other sources of tags (for example patterns) and will be included in the <head> section of the HTML document, while not being displayed on the page itself.

members.name: tags
members.doc: SEO tags information.

members.name: settings
members.doc: SEO general settings.

members.name: limit
members.doc: Number of items to load.

members.name: cursor
members.doc:
Pointer to the next or previous page in the list of results.

You can get the relevant cursor token
from the `pagingMetadata` object in the previous call's response.
Not relevant for the first request.

members.name: next
members.doc: Cursor pointing to next page in the list of results.

members.name: prev
members.doc: Cursor pointing to previous page in the list of results.

members.name: minValue
members.doc: Minimum value.

members.name: maxValue
members.doc: Maximum value.

members.name: id
members.doc: Product ID (generated automatically by the catalog).

members.name: name
members.doc: Product name.

members.name: slug
members.doc: A permanent, friendly URL name (generated automatically by the catalog).

members.name: visible
members.doc: Whether the product is visible to site visitors.

members.name: productType
members.doc: Currently, only creating physical products ( `"productType": "physical"` ) is supported via the API.

members.name: description
members.doc: Product description. Accepts [rich text](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-stores/rich-text).

members.name: sku
members.doc: Stock keeping unit (if variant management is enabled, SKUs will be set per variant, and this field will be empty).

members.name: weight
members.doc: Product weight (if variant management is enabled, weight will be set per variant, and this field will be empty).

members.name: weightRange
members.doc: Product weight range. The minimum and maximum weights of all the variants.

members.name: stock
members.doc: Product inventory status (in future this will be writable via Inventory API).

members.name: price
members.doc: Deprecated (use `priceData` instead).

members.name: priceData
members.doc: Price data.

members.name: convertedPriceData
members.doc: Price data, converted to the currency specified in request header.

members.name: priceRange
members.doc: Product price range. The minimum and maximum prices of all the variants.

members.name: costAndProfitData
members.doc: Cost and profit data.

members.name: costRange
members.doc: Product cost range. The minimum and maximum costs of all the variants.

members.name: pricePerUnitData
members.doc: Price per unit data.

members.name: additionalInfoSections
members.doc: Additional text that the store owner can assign to the product (e.g. shipping details, refund policy, etc.). Currently writable only from the UI.

members.name: ribbons
members.doc: Deprecated (use `ribbon` instead).

members.name: media
members.doc: Media items (images, videos etc) associated with this product (writable via [Add Product Media](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-stores/catalog/products/add-product-media) endpoint).

members.name: customTextFields
members.doc: Text box for the customer to add a message to their order (e.g., customization request). Currently writable only from the UI.

members.name: manageVariants
members.doc: Whether variants are being managed for this product - enables unique SKU, price and weight per variant. Also affects inventory data.

members.name: productOptions
members.doc: Options (color, size, etc) for this product.

members.name: productPageUrl
members.doc: Product page URL for this product (generated automatically by the server).

members.name: numericId
members.doc:
Product’s unique numeric ID (assigned in ascending order).
 Primarily used for sorting and filtering when crawling all products.

members.name: inventoryItemId
members.doc: Inventory item ID - ID referencing the inventory system.

members.name: discount
members.doc: Discount deducted from the product's original price.

members.name: collectionIds
members.doc: A list of all collection IDs that this product is included in (writable via the Catalog > Collection APIs).

members.name: variants
members.doc: Product variants, will be provided if the the request was sent with the includeVariants flag.

members.name: lastUpdated
members.doc: Date and time the product was last updated.

members.name: createdDate
members.doc: Date and time the product was created.

members.name: seoData
members.doc: Custom SEO data for the product.

members.name: ribbon
members.doc: Product ribbon. Used to highlight relevant information about a product. For example, "Sale", "New Arrival", "Sold Out".

members.name: brand
members.doc: Product brand. Including a brand name can help improve site and product [visibility on search engines](https://support.wix.com/en/article/adding-brand-names-to-boost-product-page-seo-in-wix-stores).

members.name: text
members.doc: Ribbon text

members.name: trackInventory
members.doc: Whether inventory is being tracked

members.name: quantity
members.doc: Quantity currently left in inventory

members.name: inStock
members.doc:
Whether the product is currently in stock (relevant only when tracking manually)
 Deprecated (use `inventoryStatus` instead)

members.name: inventoryStatus
members.doc:
The current status of the inventory
 + `IN_STOCK` - In stock
 + `OUT_OF_STOCK` - Not in stock
 + `PARTIALLY_OUT_OF_STOCK` - Some of the variants are not in stock

members.name: title
members.doc: Product info section title

members.name: description
members.doc: Product info section description

members.name: title
members.doc: Text box title

members.name: maxLength
members.doc: Text box input max length

members.name: mandatory
members.doc: Whether this text box is mandatory

members.name: totalQuantity
members.doc: Total quantity

members.name: totalMeasurementUnit
members.doc: Total measurement unit

members.name: baseQuantity
members.doc: Base quantity

members.name: baseMeasurementUnit
members.doc: Base measurement unit

members.name: filter
members.doc: Filter string

members.name: sort
members.doc: Sort string

messages.name: _wix_catalog_api_v1_QueryWithBigPageLimit
messages.displayName: Query With Big Page Limit Object

members.name: filter
members.doc: Filter string

members.name: sort
members.doc: Sort string

members.name: limit
members.doc: Amount of items to load per page

members.name: offset
members.doc: Number of items to skip in the display (relevant for all pages after the first)

members.name: items
members.doc: Amount of items to load per page

members.name: offset
members.doc: Number of items to skip in the display (relevant for all pages after the first)

members.name: limit
members.doc: Amount of items to load per page

members.name: offset
members.doc: Number of items to skip in the display (relevant for all pages after the first)

members.name: id
members.doc: Collection ID (generated automatically by the catalog)

members.name: name
members.doc: Collection name

members.name: media
members.doc: Media items (images, videos etc) associated with this collection. Read only.

members.name: numberOfProducts
members.doc: Number of products in the collection. Read only.

members.name: fieldName
members.doc: Name of the field to sort by.

members.name: order
members.doc: Sort order.

members.name: limit
members.doc: Number of items to load.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Number of items to skip in the current sort order.

members.name: filter
members.doc: Filter object.

members.name: sort
members.doc: Sorting options. For example, `[{"fieldName":"sortField1"},{"fieldName":"sortField2","direction":"DESC"}]`.

members.name: paging
members.doc: Pointer to page of results using offset. Cannot be used together with `cursorPaging`.

members.name: cursorPaging
members.doc: Cursor pointing to page of results. Cannot be used together with `paging`. `cursorPaging.cursor` can not be used together with `filter` or `sort`.

members.name: filter
members.doc: Filter object.

members.name: sort
members.doc: Sorting options. For example, `[{"fieldName":"sortField1"},{"fieldName":"sortField2","direction":"DESC"}]`.

members.name: paging
members.doc: Pointer to page of results using offset. Cannot be used together with `cursorPaging`.

members.name: cursorPaging
members.doc: Cursor pointing to page of results. Cannot be used together with `paging`. `cursorPaging.cursor` can not be used together with `filter` or `sort`.

docs.summary:
Don't use it unless you have to and know what you do. Prefer PlatformPaging or wix.common.Paging other than this.
It doesn't have max validation for limit but we still MUST have it so implement required validation in your code.

members.name: limit
members.doc: Number of items to load.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Number of items to skip in the current sort order.

docs.summary:
Don't use it unless you have to and know what you do. Prefer PlatformCursorPaging or wix.common.CursorPaging other than this.
It doesn't have max validation for limit but we still MUST have it so implement required validation in your code.

members.name: limit
members.doc:
The number of items to load.
 Cursor token returned in the query response. To be used on the next query request, but not the first query request.

members.name: cursor
members.doc: Cursor returned in last query response. Should not be provided on first page request

members.name: count
members.doc: The number of items returned in this response.

members.name: offset
members.doc: The offset which was requested. Returned if offset paging was used.

members.name: total
members.doc: The total number of items that match the query. Returned if offset paging was used.

members.name: cursors
members.doc: Cursors to navigate through result pages. Returned if cursor paging was used.

members.name: includeVariants
members.doc: Whether variants should be included in the response.

members.name: includeHiddenProducts
members.doc: Whether hidden products should be included in the response. Requires permissions to manage products.

members.name: includeMerchantSpecificData
members.doc: Whether merchant specific data should be included in the response. Requires permissions to manage products.

docs.summary: Set of key-value pairs. Array containing the selected options (e.g, color: Blue, size: Large).

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type string

members.name: id
members.doc: Requested product ID.

members.name: options
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs. Array containing the selected options (e.g, color: Blue, size: Large).

members.name: selectedVariant
members.doc: Variant information, given that all the choices were provided.

members.name: media
members.doc: Information about media items (images, videos, etc.) associated with this choice.

members.name: productOptions
members.doc: Options information (color, size, etc.) for this product, with the inventory and visibility fields updated based on the provided choices.

members.name: availableForPurchase
members.doc: Whether all the selected choices result in a visible, in-stock variant.

docs.summary:
Set of key-value pairs. The specific choices available or chosen from within a selection (e.g., choosing the red Selection triggers the red Choice).
 You may specify all the relevant choices for a specific variant, or only some of the options, which will return all corresponding variants (not relevant when passing variant IDs).

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type string

members.name: id
members.doc: Requested product ID.

members.name: choices
members.doc:
Set of key-value pairs. The specific choices available or chosen from within a selection (e.g., choosing the red Selection triggers the red Choice).
 You may specify all the relevant choices for a specific variant, or only some of the options, which will return all corresponding variants (not relevant when passing variant IDs).

members.name: variantIds
members.doc: List of variant IDs (not relevant when passing choices).

members.name: includeMerchantSpecificData
members.doc: Whether merchant specific data should be included in the response. Requires permissions to manage products.

members.doc: List of variants based on the specified filters and sorting.

messages.name: _wix_catalog_api_v1_BulkUpdateProductsByFilterSyncRequest
messages.displayName: Bulk Update Products By Filter Sync Request Object

members.name: filter
members.doc: Filter object. Learn more about supported filters [here](https://bo.wix.com/wix-docs/rest/stores/stores-catalog/filter-and-sort).

members.name: set
members.doc: The field to update.

messages.name: _wix_catalog_api_v1_BulkUpdateProductsByFilterSyncResponse
messages.displayName: Bulk Update Products By Filter Sync Response Object

members.name: results
members.doc: Items updated by bulk action.

members.name: bulkActionMetadata
members.doc: Bulk action metadata.

members.name: price
members.doc:
Set product price.
 If [variant management](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-stores-adding-and-customizing-product-options#setting-different-prices-for-variants) is enabled,
 variant prices will be calculated according to the set product price.
 If variant price is negative after setting new price, the update will fail.

members.name: cost
members.doc:
Set product cost of goods.
 If [variant management](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-stores-adding-and-customizing-product-options#setting-different-prices-for-variants) is enabled,
 cost of goods will be set per variant.

members.name: weight
members.doc:
Set product weight.
 If [variant management](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-stores-adding-and-customizing-product-options#setting-different-prices-for-variants) is enabled,
 weight will be set per variant.

members.name: ribbon
members.doc: Set product ribbon. Pass empty string to remove existing ribbon.

members.name: brand
members.doc: Set product brand. Pass empty string to remove existing brand.

members.name: results
members.doc: Items updated by bulk action.

members.doc: Bulk action metadata.

members.name: price
members.doc:
Adjust product price.
 If [variant management](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-stores-adding-and-customizing-product-options#setting-different-prices-for-variants) is enabled,
 variants prices will be calculated according to the adjusted price.
 If variant price is negative after the adjustment, the update will fail.

members.name: cost
members.doc:
Adjust product cost of goods.
 If [variant management](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-stores-adding-and-customizing-product-options#setting-different-prices-for-variants) is enabled,
 cost of goods will be adjusted per variant.

members.name: weight
members.doc:
Adjust product weight.
 If [variant management](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-stores-adding-and-customizing-product-options#setting-different-prices-for-variants) is enabled,
 weight will be adjusted per variant.

members.name: percentage
members.doc: Adjust by percentage.

members.name: amount
members.doc: Adjust by amount.

members.name: roundToInt
members.doc:
If `true`, result will be rounded to the nearest whole number.
 If `false`, result will be rounded to 2 places after the decimal point.

members.name: rate
members.doc:
Percentage value, as a whole number (integer) between -100 and 1000.
 For example, pass 100 to increase value by 100% (multiply original value by 2).

docs.summary:
`NullValue` is a singleton enumeration to represent the null value for the `Value` type union. The JSON representation for `NullValue` is JSON `null`. Possible values are:
  • NULL_VALUE - Null value.

Possible values are:
  • unspecified_media_item_type
  • image
  • video
  • audio
  • document
  • zip

Possible values are:
  • unspecified_option_type
  • drop_down
  • color

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • NONE - No discount
  • AMOUNT
  • PERCENT

Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED
  • ML
  • CL
  • L
  • CBM
  • MG
  • G
  • KG
  • MM
  • CM
  • M
  • SQM
  • OZ
  • LB
  • FLOZ
  • PT
  • QT
  • GAL
  • IN
  • FT
  • YD
  • SQFT

Possible values are:
  • unspecified_product_type
  • physical
  • digital

Possible values are:
  • IN_STOCK
  • OUT_OF_STOCK
  • PARTIALLY_OUT_OF_STOCK

Possible values are:
  • ASC
  • DESC
